thread.title: The life and career of Lamar Odom

title: The life and career of Lamar Odom
text: Blogs The life and career of Lamar Odom Lamar Odom, former NBA star and ex-husband of Khloe Kardashian, was rushed to a Las Vegas hospital after he was found unresponsive in a Nevada brothel on Oct. 13, 2015. The Daily News takes a look back at the Queens native's troubled life and career ... Photo: Deano / Splash News./ Published: 10/14/2015 2:10:12 Lamar Odom, 2015 On Oct. 13, 2015 Lamar Odom was found unconscious on the floor of his room at The Love Ranch in Las Vegas. He reportedly spent four days there, partying with girls and taking a herbal substitute for Viagra. Odom is currently clinging to life at Sunrise Hospital & Medical Center in Las Vegas with his estranged wife Khloe Kardashian and former teammate Kobe Bryant both by his side. From a promising basketball player in Queens to an NBA star, take a look back at the ups and downs of his life and career. 1 of 37
